title: manicule
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072609/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072609/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Manicule**

The pointing finger symbol ☛ commonly used in printing, advertising, and signage—called the manicule, printer's fist, mutton-fist, bishop’s fist, index, indicator, digit, pointer, director, etc, etc.

**External Links**  
 [Manicule Flickr Group](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072609/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/manicule)  
 [Toward A History Of The Manicule](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014072609/http:/www.livesandletters.ac.uk/papers/FOR_2005_04_002.html)
author: Stephen Coles
